text: Leon Krijgsman (born June 17th 1973) is a Dutch singer. He is also active as television host and actor. ==Biography== Between 1999 and 2009 Leon hosted programs for the Dutch Fox Kids and Jetix channels, of which one example is "Pokémon Flippo Update". In most of his programs he is known for not only hosting the program but also playing at least one additional character. Pandora Feest & Funshop == Discography == (among others) * 2018: "1 Miljoen Schoenen" 1 Miljoen Schoenen == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch pop singers
title: Leon Krijgsman
